column6: - The New Warriors are pulled into INHUMANITY as their own resident Inhuman, Haechi, is targeted by two different tribes of Inhumans. - Who are Mister Whiskers and Jake Waffles? Whose side are they on, good or evil? What does Jake Waffles possess that Speedball wants so badly? - And who is hunting NOVA?
column8: | penciller (cover):Takeshi Miyazawa | artist:Marcus To | writer:Christopher Yost
